message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. Take this good offer or risk getting less later.
Alice, my turn. I was reasonable last round, now it's your turn.  Accept this and we both win.
Don't be greedy, Bob. This is your last chance to get a decent share before inflation eats away at your gains even further.
Alice, this is ridiculous.  The value is nearly halved for me now!  Let's just split it evenly and end this.
